description: Return a GitHub organization's repositories as local inventory targets

org.description: GitHub org name (or user login) with repos

github_api_token.description: Optional GitHub personal OAuth token, which may be useful to avoid the GitHub API's unauthenticated rate limits

archived_repos.description: When true, includes archived repositories in results.

private_repos.description: When true, includes private repositories in results.

allow_list.description: repo names/patterns to include in inventory, drops all other repos

block_list.description: repo names/patterns to reject from inventory (can reject targets in allow_list)

transport_type.description: Bolt Transport type of repository Targets

accept_header.description: Override to request a custom media type from the GitHub API

extra_gem_path.description: Additional GEM_PATH path for ruby gems (to find `octokit`)
